situation.title: Domestic violence prevention
situation.meta_description: Threatened by your partner or another household member due to violence or coercion.

content.processed:
Recommendations

If you feel threatened by your partner or another household member due to mental, physical or sexual violence or coercion, immediately contact the helpline for domestic violence.

  • Crime and Domestic Violence Helpline White Circle of Safety: 116 006 (non-stop), FREE help for victims.
  • Helpline for victims of domestic and sexual violence proFem +420 608 222 277, social worker - Monday to Friday 9:00 - 15:00, the legal helpline for victims of domestic and sexual violence - Tuesday 9:00 - 12:00 and Wednesday 17:30 - 20:30.

In case of a direct threat, please contact Police of the Czech Republic on line 158.
